lenders.name: Christian Nipedal
lenders.loan_because: I want to be part of the solution. Having been a student with a loan of my own I recognise how fortunate I was. lenders.name: Noma & Ash
lenders.loan_because:
We believe in empowering others to achieve self-sufficiency. 

Instead of giving wedding anniversary gifts to each other annually, we donate to Kiva the sum we would have spent.

490 recipients to date ... and counting!

Friends viewing this page who are unfamiliar with Kiva: Please note that the beauty of micro-finance donations is in that your "seed donation money" can be used to help more than the original recipient.  Once the short-term loan is paid back into your Kiva account, you can re-loan the money to someone else in need.  Unlike other "conventional" forms of charitable donation, this is truly a gift that keeps on giving!

lenders.name: Rajiv Vutukuru
lenders.loan_because: I like giving and helping others in need wherever the need may be in the world.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am an incoming freshman (Fall 2012)  at Michigan State University, East Lansing, MI.

 The following quote motivated me to help through KIVA.
"While wandering a deserted beach at dawn, stagnant in my work, I saw a man in the distance bending and throwing as he walked the endless stretch toward me. As he came near, I could see that he was throwing starfish, abandoned on the sand by the tide, back into the sea. When he was close enough I asked him why he was working so hard at this strange task. He said that the sun would dry the starfish and they would die. I said to him that I thought he was foolish. there were thousands of starfish on miles and miles of beach. One man alone could never make a difference. He smiled as he picked up the next starfish. Hurling it far into the sea he said, "It makes a difference for this one." I abandoned my writing and spent the morning throwing starfish." ― Loren Eiseley

For me, that it where it all begins.

lenders.name: Desiree
lenders.loan_because: It´s the easiest way to help people all over the world...

lenders.name: Ananda and Skye
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women make a better life for themselves and their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to plan our health services so that people have fair access to the medical support they need.

lenders.name: Sandy Penny
lenders.occupational_info: Call Center

lenders.name: Mashenka
lenders.loan_because: however crappy my day is, however stupid my life might feel like sometimes - I live in one of the richest countries in the world and live a great life compared to many - so this is really the least I can do. And lets be honest, this is what credit cards should be used for.
lenders.occupational_info: From the rains of Manchester, UK to the sun of Los Angeles...

lenders.name: Kecia
lenders.loan_because: I have been given many gifts and giving back is my responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: Counselor

lenders.name: Eli
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: MKM
lenders.loan_because: I have been to many places in the world and I want to help those in places I've been and also those in places I would like to go.

lenders.name: Heike
lenders.loan_because: I read about Kiva in a magazine. For some time now I have been looking for an opportunity to do something that has a direct effect. Thanks for providing this opportunity!

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone drastically improve their life simply by lending them money in a responsible manner.

lenders.name: Dustine
lenders.loan_because: I am a grateful product of the many emotional, spiritual, and financial investments of people who have cared for my well-being. Many people, including momentary strangers, have helped to develop who I have become. I feel honored to give back to our planet and society which have given me so much. We are all in this together-we are all a part of a whole.
lenders.occupational_info: Meaningful

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: its fun.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage translation projects.

lenders.name: Meike

lenders.name: Nancy

lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mom.  Owning our own business allows me to do this.

lenders.name: Paige and Roger
lenders.occupation: womens clothing store owner and software manager
lenders.loan_because: Because for some reason GOD has graced us with all we need. It is now our responsibility to help others attain what they need!

lenders.name: Khristine
lenders.loan_because: We are all responsible for one another, all brothers and sisters on this journey.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to talk with people who have lost their housing, and to try to help them. There are many who have lost their housing where I live, because our town on the seacoast has become too expensive for most people. We build housing so they can continue to live in their community.

lenders.name: Laurent
lenders.loan_because: Small change can make a better world.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: i like to give opportunities to other people
lenders.occupational_info: entrepreneurial, technical, interesting

lenders.name: Kenny
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because:
It is the right thing to do.
"Love thy neighbor"
It brings joy to me and to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I love people, volunteering, photography, the beach, cooking and eating.

lenders.name: albert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that I have an obligation to share and help others who would do the same for me. Helping one      person indirectly helps everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: My retired interests include family, children  and grandchildren, gardening and growing trees.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I have been helped in the past.
lenders.occupational_info: I board (take care of ) horses for other people and raise flower bulbs to sell.

lenders.name: Joy
lenders.loan_because: I hate greed and corruption. I love working together to make things better.
lenders.occupational_info: I help a medical doctor who is researching cancer prevention.

lenders.name: Sierra & Family
lenders.loan_because: We've been given a lot and we want to help others.

lenders.name: Monica B.
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people around the world in their entrepreneurial endeavors.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend most of my work day at home on the computer or on the telephone.  Occasionally I meet with my customers at their place of business which is usually a library.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: There is such joy in knowing my small loans may give people a chance to have a better life... my money is His money and I want to give it back to Him... he who is gracious to the poor lends to the Lord... Proverbs 19:17
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of sick newborn babies

lenders.name: Carvel

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a bus driver

lenders.name: Ian
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes people need just a little break to help themselves improve their lives.  I know Kiva/microfinance can be that break.

lenders.name: Family

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and now concentrate on my painting.

lenders.name: Williams Family
lenders.loan_because: We're learning together how to help others.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to empower women and keep my donations multiplying.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with at-risk youth.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: I like to know where my money is going and I can make the money work over and over again.  With Kiva, I can claim to be an international financier.  ;)
lenders.occupational_info: I help keep computers running.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: Love the idea of helping people help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a family doctor

lenders.name: Johanna
lenders.loan_because: Its better to give the gift of prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an AmeriCorps*VISTA (Volunteers In Service To America) program that engages people in full time community service with the goal of ending poverty through grassroots community development activities.

lenders.name: Shahriar

Through design and development of websites our reach becomes globally accessible.  Through well-composed media and  communications, business, economy, lives, and society, can all improve.

lenders.name: Barinder Sall
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes just a little money can make a big difference in the life of a person.

its a good thing to do...   
the lord gives and the lord takes away,,,, blessed be the name of the lord,,,,,              Go Jesus,,,,  you Rock!!!

lenders.name: Antonio

lenders.occupational_info: I am a mirror in  human interaction that helps people remember the beauty of who they are and what is possible in this life.

lenders.name: kyle
lenders.loan_because: We need more people taking ownership for their lives and becoming entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Coaching & mentorship.

lenders.name: Heather and Justin
lenders.loan_because: We have been inspired by the entrepreneurial and generous spirits of our friends at the Racecourse Community School in Kitwe, Zambia and also by our friends in Engineers Without Borders Canada.
lenders.occupational_info: Heather's background is in community development and governance and Justin is an Environmental Engineer.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: It has been said that, "there can be no peace without prosperity."  Kiva accomplishes peace through prosperity.  Join us!  Thank you!

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: After seeing much of the less forunate in the world through my traveling in the miltary.  And seeing how spoiled american kids are with all of their toys my little girl included I feel if maybe I can help make a family or child smile and not ever fear or hate the people of america
lenders.occupational_info: I clean fuel tanks and inspect the metal for fatigue.  We recycle oil and seperate the water from the oil and solids.  I work in or on boats, planes, storage tanks, and trucks.

lenders.name: Reyna
lenders.loan_because: By serving others I serve myself. I feel good doing so. I have created so much more meaning and fulfillment in my life by giving and being in a state of gratitude.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm passionate about self actualization. By helping youth self express, self discover, build confidence in themselves, they have the tools to create a more fullfilling life for themselves.

lenders.name: Mike

lenders.occupational_info: I am a public servant working in municiple government, trying to make a positive difference in my community.

lenders.name: Alicia
lenders.loan_because: We can

lenders.name: Ramkil
lenders.loan_because: We are all God children and every father want the best for their children’s, how could I as a son of my heavenly father not lend a helping hand, to my brother and sister of the world who want to better the life of themselves and their family. lenders.occupational_info: I work for a multi-level marking company as the helpdesk manager, the job entails repairing computers, training individuals on software and day to day troubleshooting of IT issues including networking, internet and email.  Responsible for buying all of the electronic item such as computer, phone, cell phone etc. I work with people of different race, personality and altitudes

lenders.name: Carole

lenders.occupational_info: I am a seamstress and craftsman, producing high quality fabric items.  I also work with old textiles and linens such as antique quilts, fashioning them into something new so that their history will be preserved for future generations.

lenders.name: Kenny
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone who can should - It takes so little from me and it means so much to the people working hard to make a independant living.This is Globalization at it's best !  I'm proud to be able to help a little.
